main_definition: Potatoes, in this context, are not an idiom but a common noun referring to the starchy tuber vegetable known as Solanum tuberosum.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Incorrect use of 'potatoes' as if it were an idiom
meanings_and_examples.example: When he said 'let's meet at the potatoes,' everyone was confused because they thought it referred to a location, not realizing 'potatoes' is simply the name of a vegetable.
